FuncDef: This command adds an allowed next hop IP address to match the IP route prefix for a route-unknown priority control event.

ParaDef.Info: The IP address for an acceptable next hop IP address for a returned route prefix from the RTM when looking up the route-unknown route prefix. Values-The following values apply to the 7450 ESS:.

ExtraInfo: Default: no next-hop - No next hop IP address for the route unknown priority control event is defined.
